channel.title: CVE Feed for VideoWhisper -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VideoWhisper -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-27629|2024-08-03T05:32:59.802Z -- videowhisper -- micropayments%20-%20paid%20author%20subscriptions%2C%20content%2C%20downloads%2C%20membership
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in 'MicroPayments - Paid Author Subscriptions, Content, Downloads, Membership' versions prior to 1.9.6 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to hijack the authentication of an administrator and perform unintended operation via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-34759|2024-08-02T02:59:22.210Z -- videowhisper -- picture%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VideoWhisper Picture Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Picture Gallery: from n/a through 1.5.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-34759|2024-06-04T18:49:14.765Z -- videowhisper -- picture%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VideoWhisper Picture Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Picture Gallery: from n/a through 1.5.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-34759|2024-07-06T02:47:38.396Z -- videowhisper -- picture%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VideoWhisper Picture Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Picture Gallery: from n/a through 1.5.11.
